alert.note: Alert for Hunterdon; Mercer (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 2:38PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Hunterdon, west central Mercer and central Bucks Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 237 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sergeantsville, or 18 miles northwest of Trenton, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Doylestown, Byram, New Hope, Stockton, Washington Crossing, Gardenville, Sergeantsville, Lumberville, Sand Brook and Lambertville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
